website_summaries.verdict: Vivid colors and water activated features make this mermaid Barbie a hot commodity.
pros: Unique rainbow-colored tail lights up when in contact with water for added bath time fun
Features a necklace with an on switch for times when you'd rather skip the water works
cons: Doesn’t bend at the waist, making the doll feel a little stiff

website_summaries.verdict: Although she’s a little pricier than the average Barbie, this dazzlingly colored mermaid makes bathtime more fun with her trio of glittery rainbow light shows.
pros: Barbie’s tail brightly lights up in a range of colors when underwater
Press necklace to activate lights on land
cons: Mermaid Barbie cannot stand on its own

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy with this battery situation! the item is defected!! Will contact amazon to see
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why is it doing this where the battery’s are just burning out in a few min of playing under water but this scares me! This is the 4th time it happen since I got this toy! And the 1st time it already come like this..... so I though the batter was placed wrong, went to get new battery’s and this is what happen again!
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design, not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Barbie stopped lighting up, went to change the battery and the compartment was completely water logged and corroded. Very unsafe for a kids toy. The item description tells you to dip the mermaid in water, but it obviously cannot handle it. They didnt even put a rubber membrane on the battery compartment, just all plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Zaborowski

customer_reviews.title: HEALTH HAZARD! Lights stop working then mold grows on scalp
customer_reviews.text: I give this item only 1 star because it stopped working shortly after we received. My daughters were able to only play with it in water 2-3 times before it stopped lighting up. Then mold started growing at the base of her hair near the scalp. Um, gross. Do not purchase this item if you don't want your kids playing with moldy toys.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Seifert

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and super durable. My daughter's last one was heavily abused for years, and still functions fine to the day. She wanted a second one. My daughter baths with hers, and brings it in the pool. She left it in the pool water for a week at one point, and on the pool deck countless times, in the sun...and besides minor fading, it still functions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ohjonny

customer_reviews.title: Two months of baths, and it still looks and works the way it should.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 y/o really wanted the Sophia the First mermaid for her birthday. It had horrible reviews, so I decided on the Barbie. It has been two months, and it still works and has had no breakage issues. I took the advice of some other reviewers and left the crown attached with its shipping attachment. I can tell that was a good idea, as it is still attached and not down my tub drain.
customer_reviews.author: ohcstorm

customer_reviews.title: Great doll
customer_reviews.text: Our 4-year-old really likes the Barbie Rainbow Mermaid Doll. The item arrived about 3 days ago, 2 days later than planned due to the heavy snow storm. She has been having so much fun with the sparkle lights by pressing on the button on the necklace for the colorful lights to come on. She also submerged the Dreamtopia Mermaid Doll into the tub water to activate the rainbow lights and she then pressed the sides of the peplum to stimulate the swimming motion of the tail. Our little girl enjoys to see this "magical" Barbie doll swim while she sings her favorite Disney songs.
customer_reviews.author: Sagewood

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tub toy....until the lights stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This item was the ultimate item, it was a mermaid and it lighted up under water! My granddaughter loved this mermaid doll especially since she could play with it in the bath tub while the lights were blinking but she and I were very disappointed when the lights stopped working after a week of playing with the doll! I tried to change out the battery twice but it did not solve the issue. If the doll would have kept lighting up in the water at least for a month this would have been a dollar well spent!
customer_reviews.author: JCluvly

customer_reviews.title: DOA, had to  order batteries, with ripped package
customer_reviews.text: **update** Replaced the batteries with new that we bought. Still doesn't work. Button in the necklace is broken. I will be seeking resolution with Amazon. This was bought as a birthday gift for my daughter. The batteries are DOA. And the bottom of the package is ripped open. I went ahead and ordered the batteries that it takes, that definitely decreases the value for the money. If she opens it and we replace the batteries and it still doesn't work, we'll be sending it back for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah and Heather

customer_reviews.title: Magical Mermaid Fun
customer_reviews.text: This doll is so pretty. She's one of those that you wish you had as a kid growing up. I think I was more excited to open it than my daughter. My 4 year old thinks she's a Mermaid since she learned to swim without floaties this year, lol, so she loved it too. The tail is beautiful and lights up gorgeously. It dries well after use. We've put it in the swimming pool several times and it works fine still. I would definitely recommend this Barbie.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This was great at first, but since then it might as well be trash. My daughter doesn't use it anymore because it is NOT waterproof. Water gets into the battery compartment (yes it was screwed on tight) and completely ruined it. Black acid everywhere. Complained to the manufacturer and they had "no idea what I was talking about." They didn't do anything at all about it. I even sent them photos.
customer_reviews.author: zombieslayer

customer_reviews.title: The doll is as pretty as ads described
customer_reviews.text: The doll is as pretty as ads described. But her nose has painting and it cannot be washed away. Kind of annoying in the middle of the nose. Tried to contact with seller but no response.
customer_reviews.author: ICE

customer_reviews.title: Just what my daughter wanted!
customer_reviews.text: My soon to be 4th old said she wanted a mermaid barbie so we looked it up &this was perfect! Great price &the lights that light up the tail aren't too bright for my sensitive eyes!...only downfall is it says you can emerge the barbie halfway in water to get it to do a different light...but my little girl is going to want to put it all the way in &it'll probably mess up then so we just don't let her even get it close to the water...
customer_reviews.author: Foreman

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves barbies that look like Mermaids. This one will light up and she has taken it to the bath and the pool and it still works. I was unsure at first how it would handle being in the water as much as it has, but it has held up well and still lights up. You have to press the necklace to make her light up, and the necklace cannot be removed. The end of the tail moves which she likes.
customer_reviews.author: S Crow

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid Barbie
customer_reviews.text: I love this Mermaid Barbie. She lights up when you push a button or put her in water. Great for bathtub and pool fun for your little ones. I’ve bought 3 so far, this recent one was for one of my youngest granddaughters. The other 2 were for my oldest granddaughter and my grandson who just had to have it. Amazing gift. Love it💯👍❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Don Grndstaff

customer_reviews.title: Ruined when submerged in water
customer_reviews.text: Packaging states that Barbie can be immersed in water...as soon as my daughter put her in the bath tub, the flashing lights stopped and never worked again. We will be returning it and hoping that it was just a defective one. I can also see some trapped water (foginess) inside the mermaid tail. Does not seem water proof at all. My daughter loves everything else about it. Edited to add that apparently our window to return the item has expired. Frustrating because I ordered it early for daughters bday and then had a baby on her bday. We didn’t find out it was a bad product until last week and I’ve been in recovery mode. Dang it.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Too scared to put in water
customer_reviews.text: Pretty stoked about this barbie but TERRIFIED to actually put it in water considering all the other posts about the batteries. The instructions say "dip" in water and the description says "underwater adventures" but totally dont think it's meant to be submerged for a period of time. I haven't tried it though. I might just take the batteries out if they want to play with it in the tub or pool.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Krajny

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The mermaid is almost 13 inches long and it is quite difficult to attract the tail. The tail of the mermaid is unicorn-inspired with bright colors. There is a button on her chest that makes the tail light up. I do wish that the tail could be converted to legs to make it more versatile and the hair gets very tangled so having a hair brush included would have been helpful. The packaging was also a nightmare as with any other Barbie packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: This stopped working within a month and the head broke off!
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible For the price this should have lasted more than a month. My daughter used it about 4 times before the battery stopped working. We tried new batteries and nothing. Then the head broke off just by normal use. For the price of this product, it should definitely have lasted longer than what it did. My daughter is sad and the price has been hiked up! I don't think I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for a 7 year old and she absolutely loved it. Her face lit up when she opened it. The doll has light features and seemed well made. It was also nice that it came with the batteries already so it lit up as soon as she opened it. Well worth the price and would recommend for any little girl who loved Barbie dolls.
customer_reviews.author: T. T. R.

customer_reviews.title: Overheats too easily.
customer_reviews.text: We used this for one trip and it worked okay. Left it out in the sun while we were out hiking. Came back to tent and the front had popped off. Must have been too hot? Forgot about it and went to work I’ll it out today to take on a trip this weekend. Still broken. Would not advise purchasing this. Feels like a one time use only. How can a SOLAR charger overheat in the sun...?
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Seitzberg

customer_reviews.title: Bought the Ken Dreamtopia too.
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter loved anything that glows or swims or has anything shiny on it. She's just like her grandmom. She absolutely loves this Barbie because I bought the boy too. Now they can get married and have Dreamtopia babies!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Primazon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for the pool or tub but don't expect it to last long
customer_reviews.text: FUN for the pool or bathtub. My only complaint is that the barbie breaks easily. I bought 3 of this same barbie as one stopped working (even after replacing the battery numerous times) and the second one corroded. We always dry out the doll before we put it away, but I think it's just made cheaply. However, my daughter loves it so I keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Captivating Mermaids
customer_reviews.text: My twin grand-daughters LOVED these Barbie mermaids. Not only were they thrilled because they were mermaids, but they had never heard of these with lights in their tails. So H*A*P*P*Y !!! And for a Barbie doll, VERY affordable. Got it out fast too and arrived a day early. A+ on this seller & product.
customer_reviews.author: Tattletayl

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her rainbow light mermaid. She takes her with her to shower every day and loves playing with her. The rainbow lights look very dreamy and beautiful under water and outside.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: bath time fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who's 3 wanted Barbie for Christmas, however I felt most the Barbie's have too small of pieces (especially with a younger sister), this was a perfect option! She lights up and has accessories for the bath tub. A great intro to Barbie for little ones or great for a little one who wants to their collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid Barbie
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Mermaid Barbie for Christmas and this one was a big hit. It lights up in water which was even better! The child I bought it for loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: not water proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old's birthday. All she wanted was a light up, mermaid barbie. She beamed when she opened it and loved it. After a few times in the water it stopped working. I unscrewed the battery compartment and black gunk was all over the batteries as well as the compartment. The compartment is not a sealed one, so water leaks right through and corrodes/ruins the batteries. The advertisement for this doll, specifically states to put it in the water. Bad idea. We now have a mermaid that no longer lights up.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Eyler

customer_reviews.title: My daughter’s favorite Barbie!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 6 year old for her birthday. She loves it! She plays with it in the bathtub and in her Barbie house. It’s beautiful with lots of bright lights! Definitely a good buy and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: ShannaLynn

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my granddaughter at the pool on vacation. It was her favorite toy all week. Other 5 and 6 year old girls in the pool kept asking to play with it. She did share, but always made sure she got it back.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable, and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY thing my daughter asked for for Christmas. She is in love with this Barbie. It sleeps with her, it goes in the bath with her, and in the car with her. It has held up for this long, and so far we have had no structural issues with it; not even with the hair. It's obviously well made, and I would recommend it for other little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Vwelyn

customer_reviews.title: the tail is gorgeous and it works great. The batteries last long
customer_reviews.text: My five year old was absolutely ecstatic when she received this barbie for her birthday. The doll is very well made, high quality durable plastic, bendable limbs, the tail is gorgeous and it works great. The batteries last long. My kid bathes this doll in the sink, in the bathtub, and sleeps with her in bed, and even throws her "accidentally" on the floor sometimes. No damage so far. :) Beautiful Barbie.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiya Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and pretty...but child's upset her torso doesn't bend
customer_reviews.text: This mermaid is nice in quality and pretty...but my child's upset her torso doesn't bend. She can't sit her down or anything. It's a bit annoying that she has to lay down. But hey, this is just a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: NotYourAvSuburbMom

customer_reviews.title: Battery died after a couple days!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this mermaid for my daughter for her birthday a couple days ago and the battery already died. It didn’t even last a week. And I tried to replace the batteries and it’s a very uncommon battery to replace. I am not happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Joy Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this one time for 15 minutes and it stopped working. This item also clearly is not water friendly since the item wasn’t even fully submerged. I would not recommend this item to anyone as it is clearly made poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's cool but the battery life is not that long and the batteries to replace are those expensive watch batteries! So by the time you get batteries two or three times, you could have bought more dolls...kinda dumb. However, I didn't get that chance b/c my mermaid just stopped working even with new batteries. Wouldn't get it again but she loved it while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Most important my granddaughter is very happy. And that’s what counts. Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got what she wanted and is very happy. Shopped around and this was the best price. Came in on time and food packaging. She loves it. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Garciacano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for young girls.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for little girls. My granddaughter LOVES Barbies and the joy on her face when she saw this waiting for her as a gift was worth every penny of what was already a most reasonable price. It is very colorful, well-packaged and will put a priceless smile on any little girls's face!
customer_reviews.author: Litig8r in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old that is obsessed with mermaids! She loved it. Didnt even know it lit up, even better! Even bigger in person than the pic. Cool toy!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Watch This Video [...] This is a great product that lights up when you push the necklace and when it gets wet. The batteries are also safely secured with a screw and waterproof for young children. My 1 year old is not into Barbies yet, but she loves this Barbie because it lights up. Also for parents concerned about choking hazards the only part that needs to be removed for safety is the tiara, which is easy to take off. Nothing else besides the removable tiara on this Barbie is a choke hazard. Highly suggested for toddlers that are new to playing with Barbies because its both safe and stimulating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice toy.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves this mermaid. It has a button on the chest area so the flashing lights in the tail can be turned on at any time, and when the mermaid is in the tub, her tail lights up automatically. The mermaids hair stays very soft and smooth after using it in the tub, which many dolls hair does not. This is a very nice toy.
customer_reviews.author: countrygal

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working less than 2 mos
customer_reviews.text: This was great, my daughter loved her and played with her in the pool when she would light up. Stopped lighting up after less than 2 mos though. Changed batteries and still didn’t work. I didn’t see any corrosion or mold like others have said but she just won’t work & I followed the correct replacement instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid Barbie for the win!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked this out to add to her collection of Barbie toys! As always, this Barbie product is well made and packaged nicely. My daughter love that the mermaid tale lights up!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter's favorite
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a mermaid barbie that is 18 years old. The tail finally tore. This replacement is stunning and still a favorite bath toy after a year
customer_reviews.author: Coach Gaul

customer_reviews.title: Fun for taking to the pool with us!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this mermaid! It goes to the pool with us. Lights up Under water and is so cool
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Barbie AND a mermaid...sign my niece up...
customer_reviews.text: Welp, way to capitalize on a trend, Mattel. My niece can't get enough of Barbie have a mermaid tail...
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: wow...
customer_reviews.text: this is amazing she even lights up and changes colors! you can put her in water. Shes beautiful worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tiara

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working after my daughter used it over a period of no more than two weeks! I gave it the benefit of the doubt and blamed the batteries. I changed them out for brand new ones and the tail still won’t light up!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas V. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Decorative only
customer_reviews.text: Doll lights up when press button on neck. Pretty look at. Does nothing else. She doesnt float, swim. Child got bored.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE TROTTER

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and unique addition to Barbie collection
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old daughter loves playing with this Barbie in the tub. - She glows under water with the touch of a button or if submerged - The colors are bright and vivid - Colors light up the water once doll is submerged which makes for a fun bathtime experience
customer_reviews.author: ShellyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this!!!
customer_reviews.text: My six-year-old granddaughter picked this out from all the mermaids we could find on Amazon. It is now her favorite mermaid. She loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Russell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for young girls
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 to give to my 5, and 3 year old great nieces. They absolutely loved them. Price was equal to that of a discount store and I didn't have to fight the crowds!!!
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous doll for your mermaid loving kids!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loved it. We are just scared to take it in the water with all of the light up options it does. Beautiful toy though. She loves her. We bought the male one too.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda D.

customer_reviews.title: Might not be water proof.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after one use in water. I even bought new batteries, because the instructions say that the included batteries are for demonstration purposes. The insides were completely dry, but it still doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for Barbie Dreamtopia Rainbow lights mermaid !!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift and it has yet to be put down and child is stating she cannot wait till the summer to bring her swimming with her. Super cute doll lights up you can never go wrong with Barbie !!
customer_reviews.author: SAVY BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: Took off a star for the damaged box. It’s clearly been opened before and glued back together. Other than that, it looks like our mermaid-loving little girl will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Lenora Nail

customer_reviews.title: Super pretty Barbie
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was so happy when she got this. It lights up in rainbow lights. Even in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie B.

customer_reviews.title: Paid good $$ for this product so it shouldn't break the ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter took this ONE time into the tub & now it doesn't work at all. The batteries were all wet & the compartment was filled with water. I thought that the whole idea of this doll was to play in water, be it ocean, tub, pool, etc.? Could someone please let me know if this has happened to anyone else? Paid good $$ for this product so it shouldn't break the first time it was used!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mermaid Barbie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Granddaughter she Will be 3 in December. She Loves it!! If she is happy with it. Then I am Very Happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri T.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty and Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 4yr old girl to play with at our pool. She loved it! Very pretty and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is in love with the colors, the softness of her hair, and the pink streak in the hair.
customer_reviews.author: sally russell

customer_reviews.title: Lights do not work, even with new batteries.
customer_reviews.text: This was intended as a birthday gift for my niece. While the Barbie was great, the lights never worked, even with a change in batteries. Must have gotten a defective one. Even with the lights not working, she still loves it so I give this a 2 rating.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: Bday Present
customer_reviews.text: Present for a niece. I do not remember which niece I gave these too, but I am writing the review 6months after giving it away as a present. I believe I gave it to the niece that just turned 3 and I think it is her go to bath toy. I will update when I remember to ask about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my friend’s daughter for her 5th birthday. It is super cute and the lights are super bright and colorful. Packaging is very gift-able. She was thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Christmas disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Arrived looking fine, no unaltered packaging but when it was opened it was broken in the package and missing a small white piece on the tail that made it unable to assemble. Extremely disappointed little girl in Christmas morning! And because I purchased in advance, I cannot return! Awful!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the tub
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for a beautiful mermaid doll. She’s my daughter’s best shower friend.
customer_reviews.author: Yaser A.

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUSITY
customer_reviews.text: My youngest daughter is OBSESSED! This has made bath time so much more fun for her! She’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Makes bath time fun
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old is in love with this Barbie! Had to buy another one for my one year old so that she wouldn’t steal big sisters.
customer_reviews.author: Sydnee Jones

customer_reviews.title: A rainbow mermaid dream come true
customer_reviews.text: This doll was the hit of my daughter's birthday. The rainbow lights work well. If we turn out the lights during bath time, this doll will turn the tub into a disco party reminiscent of the scene from the digital short "Party Pooper Rex" following Toy Story of Terror. We're now buying it for all the little girl birthday parties we attend this year.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works in the water and makes child happy!
customer_reviews.text: Other than a small manufacturing defect on the hand it is great! It has withstood many tubby times and even the ocean! It is still working and lighting up and my child is very happy about this special birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: it was soooooo cool! ECXEPT
customer_reviews.text: Note: The following review was written by my ten-year-old and I promised not to edit it, so please forgive English mistakes and stream of consciousness. it was soooooo cool! ECXEPT : It would not stop lighting up and every time i put it in the water AHH blinded by neon lights come on does this thing have to light up litterly people. BUT OTHERWISE : It works great in the water ecxept the neon lights thingy BUT IT WAS SOOOOOOOO AWSOME !
customer_reviews.author: Engel

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this Barbie. Beautiful colors Pro. Beautiful Barbie Con. Doesn’t bend and it should! The other Barbie mermaids bend and so should this one.
customer_reviews.author: L. Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Great for bath time.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves mermaids, and she loves playing in the bathtub with this. The only thing I don’t like is the doll’s hair. It’s very course and looked like it needed to be brushed right out of the box. When did they stop putting brushes with the dolls?
customer_reviews.author: KH14

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old niece loves this Barbie. She takes her in the bath and she continues to light up with no issues. Great purchase for a mermaid loving kid!
customer_reviews.author: MN Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this mermaid. It does light up, but the tail fin only flaps back and forth. It is a nice product and water proof as well.
customer_reviews.author: christine.cristelli

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift for Granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a smaller version than the online picture. This came as expected and it has a "Try Me" button that I could check to make sure it was working properly since it's a Christmas gift for my granddaughter! She is going to love this and will go great with her Mermaid Treasure Chest I'm painting for her!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barbie Mermaid
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loves her Barbies and her Mermaids, so this was a no brainer!!! GREAT GIFT!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Finch

customer_reviews.title: Great for a barbie fan
customer_reviews.text: I loved that you can put this doll under water and the lights still work.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Good mermaid barbie
customer_reviews.text: Good mermaid barbie. Has 3 different light up sequences when you press her necklace. Doesn't stay lit very long. We have not put her in water due to the other reviews stating it stopped working so thats a bummer. My only other complaint I have is the mermaid dosent bend. Makes it hard to play with in a dollhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Marvici

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally gave this gift to my daughter for her birthday. First time it touched the water it now no longer lights up!!!! Cheap!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Dead Battery
customer_reviews.text: The batteries were dead. It would've been great if it worked. My little niece was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Great barbie for my 2
customer_reviews.text: Great barbie for my 2.5 year old! She loves the lights. Barbie holds up well in bath water, pool water and salt water. **MAKE SURE YOU REPLACE THE BATTERIES RIGHT AWAY.** Our barbie's batteries were in bad shape and if we had waited much longer it probably would have ruined the whole unit.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Battery compartment leaks - need a lot of batteries
customer_reviews.text: I’m lowering my initial review. I gave this to my daughter for Christmas. After 1 Month the batteries needed replaced and now I have to replace them after every bath. Water is getting into the compartment and shorting them out. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Diana Katz

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This was another gift I bought for my granddaughters birthday...its very colorful and lights up even. The hair is brushable yet the doll and clothes are durable, they don't come off so nothing to lose later down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Lights up beautifully! Package was damaged, was a gift but luckily she’s only 5! So she didn’t notice
customer_reviews.author: christine mcelfresh

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old granddaughter loves this Barbie and plays with it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Tail Doesnt Light Up At All!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nieces 4th birthday and once I received it I was so excited because shes in love with everything mermaids and the sea but so once I had looked at the box I went straight for the Try Me button because the reason for buying this also was for the tail that glows so once I pressed it, it did absolutely nothing, I had recieved a defected mermaid barbie that I cant return because my sister had told me to wait to do this until after her birthday. The barbie is still in its box and all she asks my sister is if she can open it, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: andreas grebas

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid WONDER
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged, colors of tail are beautiful. Works perfectly in water.. great for children that love mermaids and barbie.
customer_reviews.author: Elna Boodramsingh

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Xmas present!
customer_reviews.text: Immediate hit before it was even unboxed. Especially fun for playing in the bathtub!
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Pardoe

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Lights up, really pretty lights. Granddaughter will love this Barbie.
customer_reviews.author: Daboots2012

customer_reviews.title: Can survive the water
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this Barbie could not wait to put her in the shower lol
customer_reviews.author: TA010309

customer_reviews.title: I wish the had this when I was little!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this. Works great in the tub or pool.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Meenderink

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy
customer_reviews.text: any little girl who loves mermaids this is a must have. Great for the pool, bathtub, or fantasy play
customer_reviews.author: L SUT

customer_reviews.title: Broken Up on Arrival and I Can't Return
customer_reviews.text: Just gave this as a gift. They took it out of the package and the button does not depress and it does not light up and I guess there is only a 30 day return period because I can no longer return it. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Very happy grandaughter.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter for her 5th birthday and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this barbie it comes in the bath with her and in the pool!!
customer_reviews.author: The Smith Family

customer_reviews.title: Fun Barbie
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves playing with this colorful Barbie in the bath and pool. We always get compliments on it at the pool and all the kids want to play with it there-they all think it’s oretty cool that she lights up.
customer_reviews.author: Mama of 4

customer_reviews.title: Still working, so cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for my child's friend after my 5 year old loves her! It has lasted 7+ months in and out of the water and still working wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: J CHI

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this! She is four and I gave it to her for Xmas. She loves how it lights up. My sister told me this was my nieces favorite gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after the first time we used it in water.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited for this Barbie. Unfortunately, it stopped working the first day she had it. The lights worked in the box, but when we put it in the bath it stopped working. I can see water in the tail and condensation.
customer_reviews.author: SarahKate78

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this mermaid doll. She lights up bright colors and she loves to play with her in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: michelle r.

product_meta.title: Barbie Dreamtopia Rainbow Lights Mermaid Doll, Blonde with Light-up Tail
product_meta.description: Make a real splash with the Barbie Rainbow Lights Mermaid doll! Dip this Barbie doll into water to see her mermaid tail glimmer with colorful lights inspired by a sparkling rainbow. It’s a total wow moment! Simply press the button in Barbie doll’s necklace to switch her to “on” mode, and dip her into the tub or pool. The colorful light show starts automatically once her hidden probes are activated by the water. Or bring the magic ashore -you can push the button in Barbie doll’s necklace to enjoy the light show without water. After 10 minutes of inactivity, she will go into “sleep” mode. Rainbow fins, a “pearl”-decorated belt, pink-streaked hair and a princess tiara complete the head-to-toe magical mermaid look. Tell all sorts of fantastic fairytales with this gorgeous mermaid doll. Includes Barbie mermaid doll with light-up feature. Doll cannot stand or swim alone. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Make a real splash with this magical light-up Barbie mermaid doll!
Dip Barbie Rainbow Lights Mermaid doll into water to see her mermaid tail glimmer with colorful lights inspired by a sparkling rainbow!
Press the button in Barbie doll’s necklace to switch her to “on” mode, and dip her into the tub or pool to activate the light show.
Bring the magic ashore - you can push the button in the doll’s necklace to enjoy the light show without water.
Rainbow fins, a “pearl”-decorated belt, pink-streaked hair and a princess tiara complete the head-to-toe magical mermaid look.
